topic: Credit Requirements for Master's Thesis Submission

correspondence.message: I am a master's student and I have a thesis that I may need to work on during my 6th semester but will submit it in the 7th semester. Can you confirm if this is allowed given that I will have 90 ECTS by the end of my 5th semester?"
If you have at least 90 ECTS by the end of your 5th semester, you may study 7 semesters and submit your thesis in your 7th semester. You should be fine.
